coin-info.btc.description: Bitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network. Bitcoin is open-source; its design is public, nobody owns or controls Bitcoin and everyone can take part. Through many of its unique properties, Bitcoin allows exciting uses that could not be covered by any previous payment system.
coin-info.description.about-bitcoin: Bitcoin uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks; managing transactions and the issuing of bitcoins is carried out collectively by the network. Through many of its unique properties, Bitcoin allows exciting uses that could not be covered by any previous payment system.

crypto-wallet.buy.buy-terms: By clicking the confirm order buttom below, I authorize Wyre Payments, Inc., to electronically charge my credit/debit card (and, if necessary, electronically credit my card) using the card indicated by me. I understand that this authorization will remain in full force and effect until I notify HUMBL Crypto Wallet that I wish to revoke this authorization. I agree that credit/debit card transactions I authorize, comply with all applicable law.

Phone number is mismatched or invalid.
The transaction got flagged as fraudulent. Please verify that the CVV or CID code is entered correctly, or contact your bank.
It looks like the order expired.
Your bank has denied the transaction. Please contact your bank and then try again.
Insufficient funds. This happens when the limit on the payment method is exceed. We recommend to contact your bank to increase their limit, or use an alternative payment method.

Restricted operation. This happens if your system does not accepts AMEX or Discover, or the card in use is not authorized for internet payments. We recommend to contact the merchant or use an alternative payment method.
It looks like there's a problem with the card number. Please contact your bank, or use an alternative payment method.
You reached the daily purchase limit.
An error occurred while validating payment method info. Please verify that the payment method info is correct and then try again.
It looks like we weren’t able to process your order. We recommend you review your payment method and try again.

pages-accept-cards.stripe-details:
The HUMBL Matching Engine™ is directing you to a third party payment services provider that can help you process credit cards.

The agreement you are entering is fully between you and the third party provider and you must assure that you are in compliance with their terms and conditions.

Once you are done, come back to HUMBL for maps, ratings, reviews and more.

terms-and-conditions.content:
We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to change, modify or otherwise alter these Terms and Conditions at any time. Unless otherwise indicated, amendments will become effective immediately. Please review these Terms and Conditions periodically. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes and/or modifications will constitute your acceptance of the revised Terms and Conditions and the reasonableness of these standards for notice of changes. For your information, this page was last updated as of the date at the top of these terms and conditions.

We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to change, modify or otherwise alter these Terms and Conditions at any time. Unless otherwise indicated, amendments will become effective immediately. Please review these Terms and Conditions periodically. Your continued use of the Site following the posting of changes and/or modifications will constitute your acceptance of the revised Terms and Conditions and the reasonableness of these standards for notice of changes. For your information, this page was last updated as of the date at the top of these terms and conditions.

payment-limitations.drawer.both.subtitle: We are currently limiting the ability to add payment methods in certain states.
payment-limitations.drawer.both.ach-sect: We are currently not accepting banks from: Connecticut, Hawaii, New York, New Hampshire, Texas, Vermont, and Virginia.
payment-limitations.drawer.both.card-sec: We are currently not accepting credit and debit cards from Texas and New York for crypto transactions.
payment-limitations.drawer.card.title: Texas and New York crypto payment limitations
payment-limitations.drawer.card.subtitle: We are currently not accepting credit and debit cards from Texas and New York. When adding a card, make sure it is from an eligible state.
payment-limitations.drawer.ach.title: State limitations for ACH transactions
payment-limitations.drawer.ach.subtitle: We are currently not accepting banks from: Connecticut, Hawaii, New York, New Hampshire, Texas, Vermont, and Virginia. When adding a bank, make sure it is from an eligible state.
crypto-wallet.buy.banner.text: Learn about payment limitations in your state.
send-order-preview.action-modal.main-tex: Gasless transactions are transactions with no additional fees added on top. This happened as a result of you sending crypto to another HUMBL wallet.
twofactor.error.titleText-WrongCode: Looks like the wrong codes were submitted
twofactor.error.mainText-WrongCode: It looks like we found some errors with the mobile and bank verificationcodes that were submitted. Please go back and try again.
twofactor.error.mainText-TooManyAttempts: It looks like you've reached the maximum number of attempts to review your verification codes. Please try again.
twofactor.error.mainText-TimeOut: It looks like you have reached the maximum amount of time. Please try again.

add-card-tx-ny-error-title: Texas and New York Crypto Payment Limitations
add-card-tx-ny-error-subtitle: Due to state regulations, you are not able to purchase crypto using cards from New York or Texas. You can still use this card for other transactions outside of crypto purchases.
send-user-flow-no-contacts-found-text: It looks like none of your contacts are on HUMBL. You can still search for users in the HUMBL community.

etx.invest.payment-method.no-crypto.head: Buy crypto to invest
etx.invest.payment-method.no-crypto.desc: You do not have any crypto coins in your wallet. Add crypto currencies to get started.
etx.invest.order-preview.header.amount-d: This amount will be distributed as:
etx.invest.order-preview.exit-modal.titl: Are you sure you want to exit?
etx.invest.order-preview.error-modal.sub: An error occurred while validating payment method info. please verify that the payment method info is correct and try again.  We recommend you review your payment method and try again.
etx.invest.order-success.title.order-com: Purchase of ETX Block X done Successfully
etx.invest.order-success.message.confirm: A confirmation email was sent to {{email}}. The transaction might take 3-5 days to process.
etx.withdraw.order-preview.header.you-ar: You are Transferring to your Saving Wallet
etx.withdraw.order-preview.exit-modal.ti: Are you sure you want to exit?
etx.withdraw.order-preview.error-modal.s: An error occurred while validating payment method info. Please verify that the payment method info is correct and then try again.
etx.modal.etx_description: The BLOCK X gives investors basic exposure to select major blockchains.
etx.modal.portfolio_composition_descript: BLOCK X constituent assets are ranked through a proprietary combination of their relative USD market capitalizations, one- month trading volume, and in depth due diligence on market conditions. The weighting of a constituent asset in the Index is determined by the asset's rank.
etx.modal.methodology_description: The ranking framework is as follows: First the market capitalization of each constituent asset is calculated as the price of the asset multiplied by the avilable or circulating supply of the asset. Then, BLOCK X constituents are ranked by a Hybird of market capitalization, market conditins, trading volume, liquidity and on-chain activity.
etx.modal.periodic_rebalancing_descripti: Unlike standard equity markets, the digital asset markets trade 24/7, 365 days per year. Additionally, as with any fast-paced asset class, new developments occur frequently and require rebalancing to ensure optimum weighting of constituent assets.

etx.withdraw.choose_asset.banner.modal.i: Interest will be automatically credited to your wallet on the 1st of every month.
